scripts.pack: bestzip extension.zip manifest.json background.js content.js styles.css options.html options.js options.css icons/
scripts.pack:firefox: mkdir -p dist_firefox && cp background.js content.js styles.css options.html options.js options.css manifest.firefox.json dist_firefox/ && cp -r icons dist_firefox/ && mv dist_firefox/manifest.firefox.json dist_firefox/manifest.json && cd dist_firefox && bestzip ../nozo-firefox.xpi * && cd .. && rm -rf dist_firefox
